interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Racily Hair 8A Brazilian Kinky Curly Ombre Hair Extensions 3 Pcs 2 Tone 1B 30# Ombre Brazilian Curly Virgin Hair (12"14"16")
Review Date: 2018/03/01
Store: R RACILY HAIR
Average Rating: 2.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'R RACILY HAIR', 'Extension Length': '12 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.35 x 7.72 x 2.24 inches; 10.88 Ounces', 'UPC': '783057242585'}
Review Text: Will definitely order again. Longer next time. This time, I got the 14,16,18. The color is gorgeous and a true 30 color. I did lightly bleach it to bring that ombre 30 higher/closer to the weft (I wanted the lighter color closer to my eye area and not just on the bottom half of the hair. I attached photos to show how the curl pattern was affected by the bleach (deep curl pattern still in effect, just went from a jerry-4a to a 3b/3c (see the first and second pics). In that 2nd pic, the first section of hair is out of the pack, not washed or dyed; the second section of hair is the bleached portion, and the third piece is not bleached, only just cowashed. You can see beautiful curls in all three section, so feel free to wash or bleach (be careful, though), the curls seem to be here to stay. Lastly, the length is very true (slightly longer, actually).
Review Title: Yes, yes, yes!!!!! I hope this seller stays in business 4ever! Wish I could order single bundles...
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

R RACILY HAIR Racily Hair 8A Ombre Brazilian Hair 3/4 Bundles Kinky Curly Unprocessed Virgin Brazilian Hair Black to Dark Brown 2 Tone #1B 30 Curly Weave Human Hair (14" 16" 18")
{'Color': 'Brown', 'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13 x 8 x 2 inches; 12 Ounces', 'UPC': '718040918840'}
Will definitely order again.  Longer next time.  This time, I got the 14,16,18. The color is gorgeous and a true 30 color.  I did lightly bleach it to bring that ombre 30 higher/closer to the weft (I wanted the lighter color closer to my eye area and not just on the bottom half of the hair. I attached photos to show how the curl pattern was affected by the bleach (deep curl pattern still in effect, just went from a deep 4a to a 3b/3c (see the third pic).  In that 3rd pic, the first piece of hair is out of the pack, not washed or dyed; the second piece of hair is the bleached portion, and the third piece is just cowashed.  You can see beautiful curls in all three parts, so feel free to wash or bleach, the curls seem to be here to stay. Lastly, the length is very true (slightly longer, actually).
Yes, yes, yes!!!!!  I hope this seller stays in business 4ever!

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user has a strong affinity for floral themes and vibrant decorative accessories, particularly in hair styling. They are dedicated to exploring high-quality beauty tools that enhance personal appearance, with a focus on effective and practical solutions for hair care.

- **Occasions:** Their interest in products suitable for weddings and birthdays highlights a love for celebratory items, allowing for creative expression through accessories and styling.

- **Aesthetic:** The user appreciates visually appealing designs featuring colorful embellishments like flowers and bows. They favor high-quality, versatile hair accessories that contribute to personalized looks.

- **Quality Expectation:** The user maintains a critical approach to reviews, emphasizing quality and effectiveness. Their recent positive experience with hair products reinforces their commitment to reliable brands. They have expressed satisfaction with products featuring minimal tangling, indicating a preference for practicality and ease of maintenance.

- **Target Group:** They lean toward sophisticated, adult-targeted products that enhance personal grooming and style.

Overall, the user enjoys decorative accessories that enrich their personal style for social events while actively seeking quality beauty solutions in hair care and styling. Their latest purchase reflects a successful experience with hair extensions, leading to enthusiasm for color versatility and the longevity of curls post-treatment, further solidifying their pursuit of effective products that align with their aesthetic ideals.
